analysis.key_quote: I am appalled at what DOGE has done to our civil service throughout all of the agencies affected by staff cuts, research stopped, grant money halted, etc.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the actions taken that affect civil service integrity and employee rights, indicating concerns about politicization and the need for non-partisan oversight. The emphasis on protecting rights and dignity further aligns with a stance against the proposed rule.
